alert.note: Alert for Wilkinson (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 9:28AM CDT until May 25 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WEST FELICIANA...NORTHWESTERN EAST FELICIANA PARISHES IN SOUTHEASTERN LOUISIANA AND WILKINSON COUNTIES... At 928 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Sibley to near Jackson, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Centreville, Woodville, Norwood, Dolorosa, Spillman and Crosby. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
